reviewText: Hollywood has loved gangster stories for decades upon decades now. What makes the saga of the Gotti family so compelling is that it was all true. With millions of dollars at stake, criminal mastermind John Gotti thumbed his nose at the authorities over and over again. In the end, strife within his own organization was his undoing. It's a fascinating story.
